create.title: Add floors
create.description: Enter floor with relative vertical position (e.g., 0 for first floor, 0.5 for mezzanine floor, 1 for second floor) and designation

description.single:
Are you really sure
you want to delete this floor?
The process cannot be undone
description.multiple:
Are you really sure
you want to delete these floors?
The process cannot be undone

update.title: Edit floor
update.description: Enter floor with relative vertical position (e.g., 0 for first floor, 0.5 for mezzanine floor, 1 for second floor) and designation
